attributes.action: Please Stop Work At Home Scams
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I and many others have been conned by a company called 'A1 Mailing and Typing Services, they do not exist. I paid £30 to them for work at home mailing work and it was all a scam, it was an attractive offer especially at these times when I had my hours cut at work and needed to make up the money. Please join me and stop these villains.
